key_risks: Supply chain disruptions due to semiconductor shortages and rising raw material costs
Geopolitical risks from operations in politically sensitive regions like Russia and Eastern Europe
Intense competition from global players like LG, Samsung, and Whirlpool
controversies: Occasional criticisms regarding labor conditions in some manufacturing facilities, particularly in emerging markets
Scrutiny over the environmental impact of manufacturing processes and product lifecycle
environmental_issues: Environmental impact of manufacturing processes, including air, water, and soil pollution
Challenges in achieving long-term sustainability goals like carbon neutrality by 2050
social_issues: Labor practices and conditions in manufacturing facilities, particularly in emerging markets
governance_issues: Need for continuous improvement in supplier sustainability and environmental impact reduction

sources.title: Environmental Impacts of Products - Life Cycle Assessment
sources.snippet: Impacts of processes on environment are classified in 7 categories as; Air pollution. Water pollution. Soil pollution. Raw material consumption. GHG effect. Noise pollution. Odour. sources.title: 土耳其跨国家用电器制造商：阿奇立克 Arçelik Anonim Sirketi(ACKAY)
sources.snippet: 阿奇立克 Arçelik Anonim Sirketi(ACKAY)历史百科. Arçelik 由 Lütfü Doruk 与 Vehbi Koç 于 1955 年创立，并于 1959 年在伊斯坦布尔 Çayırova 的制造工厂生产第一台洗衣机和第一台冰箱，进入土耳其大型家电行业。 1968 年，Arçelik 迁至伊斯坦布尔附近的 Çayırova 工厂。
